blogPost.title: What makes a good ally? Answer by @soulfreedreams, Founder and Executive Director @MPJInstitute. https://t.co/CJCqRxjv76 https://t.co/O3l1OKZwVF
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 良い同盟者とは？Answer by @soulfreedreams, Founder and Executive Director @MPJInstitute. https://t.co/CJCqRxjv76 https://t.co/O3l1OKZwVF
怎样才能成为一个好的盟友？回答者：@soulfreedreams，创始人兼执行董事@MPJInstitute。https://t.co/CJCqRxjv76 https://t.co/O3l1OKZwVF
怎樣才能成爲一個好的盟友？回答者：@soulfreedreams，創始人兼執行董事@MPJInstitute。https://t.co/CJCqRxjv76 https://t.co/O3l1OKZwVF

previous.title: What are the common physical symptoms of stress? Answer by @KeckMedUSC. https://t.co/FVBBPr8oby https://t.co/RfYkjQ5nYs

localize.full_text: ストレスによる一般的な身体的症状は何ですか？Answer by @KeckMedUSC. https://t.co/FVBBPr8oby https://t.co/RfYkjQ5nYs
压力的常见身体症状是什么？答案：@KeckMedUSC. https://t.co/FVBBPr8oby https://t.co/RfYkjQ5nYs
壓力的常見身體症狀是什麼？答案：@KeckMedUSC. https://t.co/FVBBPr8oby https://t.co/RfYkjQ5nYs

next.title: Why are air traffic control towers shaped the way they are? Answer by Ron Wagner, USAF pilot in Presidential Wing at Andrews. https://t.co/qhow2PSgxW https://t.co/iP6YeKcq76

localize.full_text: 航空管制塔はなぜあのような形をしているのですか？Answer by Ron Wagner, USAF pilot in Presidential Wing at Andrews. https://t.co/qhow2PSgxW https://t.co/iP6YeKcq76
为什么空中交通管制塔的形状是这样的？回答者：罗恩-瓦格纳，美国空军在安德鲁斯的总统翼飞行员。https://t.co/qhow2PSgxW https://t.co/iP6YeKcq76
爲什麼空中交通管制塔的形狀是這樣的？回答者：羅恩-瓦格納，美國空軍在安德魯斯的總統翼飛行員。https://t.co/qhow2PSgxW https://t.co/iP6YeKcq76
